thread.title: BRIEF-GasLog Ltd Qtrly Adjusted Loss Per Share $0.01

title: BRIEF-GasLog Ltd Qtrly Adjusted Loss Per Share $0.01
text:
May 4, 2018 / 11:21 AM / in 3 minutes BRIEF-GasLog Ltd Qtrly Adjusted Loss Per Share $0.01 Reuters Staff
May 4 (Reuters) - GasLog Ltd: * GASLOG LTD QUARTERLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.21
* GASLOG LTD - QTRLY REVENUE $138.5 MILLION VERSUS $128.3 MILLION
* GASLOG LTD - 7.1% INCREASE IN QTRLY DIVIDEND TO $0.15 PER COMMON SHARE PAYABLE ON MAY 24, 2018
* GASLOG LTD - CONTRACTED CHARTER REVENUES ESTIMATED TO INCREASE FROM $486.0 MILLION FOR FISCAL YEAR 2017 TO $523.7 MILLION FOR THE FISCAL YEAR 2019 Source text: ( bit.ly/2rmKKkr ) Further company coverage:
